title: help please!!!!
body:
Hello
I was gifted a mystery box by a friend .
I exited too fast and didn't get a chance to open and see what it was.
How can i find out what i was gifted?

replies.body: That was nice of your friend!  You should be able to discover the comments by checking your purchase history in the store section.  I double checked for you and it appears to be...omg...[DJ Sona](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uHJyAZtRrOY)!  Congrats!!
